ids.description: A list of event ids or prefixes to filter by

authors.description: A list of pubkeys or prefixes to filter by

kinds.description: A list of event kind numbers to filter by

#e.description: A list of event ids that are referenced in an "e" tag

#p.description: A list of pubkeys that are referenced in a "p" tag

since.description: An integer Unix timestamp in seconds, events must be newer than this to pass

until.description: An integer Unix timestamp in seconds, events must be older than this to pass

limit.description: The maximum number of events to return in the initial response
